trans-unit.source: Represents the standard parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representa os parâmetros padrão para o algoritmo ECC (criptografia de curva elíptica).

trans-unit.source: Represents the curve associated with the public key (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q" />) and the optional private key (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D" />).
trans-unit.target: Representa a curva associada à chave pública (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q" />) e a chave privada opcional (<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D" />).

trans-unit.source: Represents the private key <see langword="D" /> for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm, stored in big-endian format.
trans-unit.target: Representa a chave privada <see langword="D" /> para o algoritmo ECC (criptografia de curva elíptica) armazenado no formato big-endian.

trans-unit.source: Represents the public key <see langword="Q" /> for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representa a chave pública <see langword="Q" /> para o algoritmo ECC (criptografia de curva elíptica).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Validate%2A> method checks the integrity of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> structure, throwing a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> when it is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Validate%2A> método verifica a integridade do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters> estrutura, lançando um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> quando não é válido.

trans-unit.source: are required fields and must have the same length.
trans-unit.target: são campos obrigatórios e deve ter o mesmo comprimento.

trans-unit.source: If the curve is an explicit curve, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> is required and must have the same length as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Order>.
trans-unit.target: Se a curva é uma curva explícita, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> é necessário e deve ter o mesmo comprimento que <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve.Order>.

trans-unit.source: If the curve is a named curve, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> is required and must have the same length as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECPoint.X>
trans-unit.target: Se a curva é uma curva nomeada, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.D> é necessário e deve ter o mesmo comprimento que <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Q>.<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECPoint.X>

trans-unit.source: The key or curve parameters are not valid for the current curve type.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de chave ou curva não são válidos para o tipo de curva atual.
